website_summaries.verdict: Smaller footprint makes this model great for those living in tight spaces.
pros: Convenient slide-out drawers in freezer allow for easy organization
Counter depth means it has a built-in look
cons: Freezer space is a bit tight, so don't expect to fit very large items in this area
Doesn't have an on-door ice or water dispenser

customer_reviews.title: Great value, worth the wait.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous ordering an appliance online really. It worked out great! Saved money and am happy with my purchase. You have to be patient for it to arrive, there was a bit of a delay. We really like the counter depth for our small kitchen, the draw back is there is no egg or butter compartments and no lunch meat drawer. It’s just shelves and in door storage. The drawers in the freezer are really nice And...it is so quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great Refrigerator for our RV
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this refrigerator as a replacement for our Norcold RV Gas/Electric Refrigerator in our 5th Wheel RV. The Haier Unit fits perfect where the Norcold unit was, works great, has plenty or room and has a low amperage draw when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Love this refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's the perfect size for my kitchen and I love the fact that I only need to open the quadrant that I need.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie aliberti

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: We never heard about HAIER before and we're a little skeptical about the purchase but are pleasantly surprised how awesot this fridge looks and works. Very sturdy inside and sleek. Setting it up was a breeze. We hadany compliments on the fridge. We approve this buy as the price for this unit was also fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Maximiliana Mimi Marzell-Carnagua

customer_reviews.title: Not a large fridge but nice if you don't have a large family.
customer_reviews.text: The 2 door freezer is nice, it has 2 drawers and a shelf behind each door. The fridge is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: bert600

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this on the low cause of a small ding in the side. It was worth it. Everyone says they love that it’s 4 doors. It’s well lit and easy to clean. Space in the fridge is wide but only as tall as a gallon of milk and freezer doors are deep. A frozen pizza doesn’t fit in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baker

customer_reviews.title: Cannot say enough about this refrigerator.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this fridge eight months and love it! I would say it is great for one to four people. It arrived very quickly. I live in a condo so space is at a premium. Having the fridge be counter-depth makes the kitchen seem bigger.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great features for a smaller refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: We had a 33 inch hole for any new refrigerator we bought and after looking at the very sparse options, we chose a Haier. We bought our daughter some Haier window air conditioners for her apt in 2008 and are still using them in our bedroom, so we thought it might be a dependable brand. We are really pleased with our new refrigerator. It's the right size for a couple, the freezer with it's drawers makes things easy to organize and find, and it has kept its temperature perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Buchs

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: First time I bought an appliance online! I couldn't find a counter depth where I lived. This is a great fridge. I love the freezer compartments on the bottom. The doors do shut hard. No problem wiping off fingerprints with a damp towel. Timely delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Allen

customer_reviews.title: Meets the need
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Like all the compartments. Only issue is the doors don't close well, so you have to actually push them closed a little more than normal to be sure it happens every time.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great counter depth fridge!
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is perfect for my smaller kitchen. I needed something that would fit into a small space yet provide room for perishable foods. It’s attractive, efficient and storage is quite ample.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Beware of buying this brand
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator worked great until a couple of months after the 1 year warranty expired. The repair company can't repair it until they can get a part that is on back order. We have to wait until February before it can be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, nice looking, bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: My Haier hrq16n3bgs refrigerator 4 doors bottom freezer had a problem with the refrigerator not cooling after only 14 months. The refrigerator came with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty. A called Haier and they told me that the refrigerator was not designed to be used in the garage. It only works in temperature controlled rooms. That is information they should put in big letters. Anyways, I diagnosed the problem and it was the evaporator fan. Finding parts or a service manual is basically impossible. Bottom line is that this is a cheap refrigerator with poor quality and support.
customer_reviews.author: Expert

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: This fridge completely broke and had to be replaced as soon as it was out from under warranty. It was a cheap product that cost me a lot. Very disappointed. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 15 months. Just passed warrenty, company hard to get on the phone. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lsing

product_meta.title: Haier 16.0 Cu. Ft. 4 Door Bottom Freezer Refrigerator Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: 16.4 cu. ft. Capacity 33 Inches Wide LED Lighting Counter Depth Quick Cool Quick Freeze Touch Temperature Controls Sabbath Mode Freestanding
feature_bullets: Dimensions (WHD): 32.75 in. X 71 in. X 26.5 in.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars23 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
